name: Nuclear Power Plant Job
description:
a little prototype of point and click game

I made it in few hours

You have to control the core temperature of the nucleus... but..

it is your first day in this new job and you don't have the security code of the console!!!

The computer's admin password and the security code are somewhere in the game

All the resources made in the time of the game jam.

if you like the music, you can use it...
